document_data.name: Thurduil
document_data.mainbody: '''Thurduil''' was a mage instructor in the late 8{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: Thurduil had been the first magic instructor of [[Alustriel]].
document_data.History: Between {{yearlink|767}} and {{yearlink|778}}{{cite book/Elminster in Hell/Hardcover 2001|2|Realmslore}}, Thurduil had been Alustriel's instructor for eight years, hired by her uncle, [[Thamator]]. Her tutoring proceeded under a different wizard later, [[Gaerd]].
